reviewText: I was so happy to find this piece of nostalgia. It's amazing to see how far TV sci-fi has come in 30 years. The MST3k crew edited their source materials, often to add to the incoherence. It was really great to see what I have been missing all of these years. The only disappointment for me is that this is the only 'movie' Sandy Frank made of this Japanese series. I really hoped there would be more.
